item.title: [pi] d claws spec bar.!
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

hey guys the name says it, i have problems with the spec bar, it doesn’t come up.
i add this code to item assistant.java (source side)
case 14484: // d Clawz
c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7800);
specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7812);
break;
i got 0 error’s but my spec bar does not come up? help pls

Read full topic
